name: Rasterize me!
description:
Share safe link with customer. In just 2 clicks, you can automatically rasterize(flatten) all/any the elements that are inside the Figma file. The plugin will be useful for each designer who is afraid to give Figma link for his work to an unverified customer!


Rasterize the selected layers at a high resolution (2x, 3x, 4x, 8x). This is to work around a limitation in Figma where layers can only be rasterized at 1x resolution.


The plugin will help you to rasterize:

  1. Any selected element
  2. Any selected page in its entirety, no matter how many elements it contains
  3. Any figma file, no matter how many pages it contains


How it works?

https://youtu.be/Fs5rBUwSjc0
